isActive.value: function process(data) { if (data['IS_ACTIVE']) { return data['IS_ACTIVE'] === 'Y' || data['IS_ACTIVE'] === 'true'; } return true; }

isPrimary.value: function process(data) { if (data['IS_PRIMARY']) { return data['IS_PRIMARY'] === 'Y' || data['IS_PRIMARY'] === 'true'; } return false; }

timeCreated.value: function process(data) { if(data['TIME_CREATED']) { return data['TIME_CREATED']; } return new Date().getTime().toString(); }

lastModified.value: function process(data) { if(data['LAST_MODIFIED']) { return data['LAST_MODIFIED']; } return new Date().getTime().toString(); }
